Update Org Number to Aus Post format

fieldUpdates.formula:
(CASE(Account_Owner_Role_Group__c , "Key Accounts Partner", IF(Total_Budget__c >= 1, 4, 12),
CASE(Account_Owner_Role_Group__c , "Medium", IF(Total_Budget__c >= 1000000, 4, IF(AND(Total_Budget__c >= 500000, Total_Budget__c < 1000000), 4, IF(AND(Total_Budget__c >= 250000, Total_Budget__c < 500000), 6, IF(AND(Total_Budget__c >= 72000, Total_Budget__c < 250000), 8, IF(AND(Total_Budget__c >= 1, Total_Budget__c < 72000), 10, 12))))),
CASE(Account_Owner_Role_Group__c , "Small", IF(Total_Budget__c >= 60000, 4, IF(AND(Total_Budget__c >= 40000, Total_Budget__c < 59999), 8, IF(AND(Total_Budget__c >= 30000, Total_Budget__c < 39999), 10, IF(AND(Total_Budget__c >= 10000, Total_Budget__c < 29999), 12, 26)))), 0))))*7
fieldUpdates.name: Update Frequency

flowActions.description: Flow Trigger calls Autolaunched flow to update the Account fields such as 'Industry', 'Business Category', 'Business Sub Category' based on the corresponding ANZSIC fields in the Flow Trigger parameter.
flowActions.label: ANZSIC - Update Account Industry/Business/Sub-Category

rules.description: When the Record Type is set to Licence CMA, set the Licence Type to CMA
When the Record Type is set to Licence CPA, set the Licence Type to CPA
When the Record Type is set to Licence, set the Licence Type to LPO
When the Record Type is set to Licence PP, set the Licence Type to PP

rules.fullName: Date of Acct Manager%2FSales Team Change
rules.description: This workflow will push the date that the Change was made for the Account Manager or Sales Team as per the Sales Coverage Change Request.
Designed to alert the LBP admin team where a Facility record is marked as Active AND the related Network record (via the facility record) is currently set to Tier 1OR2 in the LBP fields.
rules.formula: RecordType.Name = "Licence" && ISPICKVAL( Licence_Type__c , "LPO") && ISPICKVAL( Licence_Status__c , "Active") && OR( ISPICKVAL( Facility__r.Network_Facility__r.LBP_Retail_relationship_type_network__c , "Tier 1"), ISPICKVAL( Facility__r.Network_Facility__r.LBP_Retail_relationship_type_network__c , "Tier 2"))

rules.description: This sets the Service SLA field for Accounts based on count of Role records with Role Type = "Known"

rules.fullName: Partner CMA CPA Cease Licence Automatic
rules.description: Update Licence Status to Ceased when Assignment Effective To Date has passed for CMA CPA
rules.formula: AND(OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Licence_CMA',RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Licence_CPA'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Approval_Status__c, 'Cease Approved')), ISPICKVAL( Licence_Status__c , 'Active'), NOT(ISNULL( Assignment_Effective_To_Date__c )))

rules.description: Set the Assignment Effective To Date on CMA CPA when Start Date is changed.
rules.formula: OR( AND(ISNEW(), OR(RecordType.Name = 'Licence CPA', RecordType.Name = 'Licence CMA'), NOT(ISNULL( Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c ) )) , AND(ISCHANGED( Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c ), OR(ISPICKVAL(Approval_Status__c , 'Approved'), ISPICKVAL( Licence_Status__c , 'Draft')),OR(RecordType.Name = 'Licence CPA', RecordType.Name = 'Licence CMA'), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Licence_Status__c ,'Active')), NOT(ISNULL(Assignment_Effective_From_Date__c))))

rules.description: Reminders to State admin 6, 3, 1 months and 7 days before Assignment effective to Date.
rules.formula: AND(OR(RecordType.Name = 'Licence CPA', RecordType.Name = 'Licence CMA') , NOT(ISNULL(Assignment_Effective_To_Date__c)) , ISPICKVAL( Licence_Status__c , 'Active'))

rules.description: If the Licence is approved, then schedule its activation to be triggered after 18 hours on its start date.
Workflow to capture licence cease and set up the time trigger for status change

rules.fullName: Partner Info Is a Facility Update
rules.description: Upon conversion update Is a facility flag = True
If Licence start date is due in 7 days and it is still in Pending status, then send an email to State Admin and the Network Manager.

rules.fullName: Phase 2 - date stamp for ABN Change
Phase 2 - date stamp for ACN Change
Phase 2 - populate hidden description on Person Account
rules.description: so they can used in the scoring formulas
This workflow rule is triggered when facility record in Account object (organisation) to update the "WCIS Code - Searchable" field from the WCIS Code field.
This outbound message propagates Person Account data back to SAP-CRM.
rules.formula: AND( OR( AND( $Profile.Name != "AusPost Integration", ISBLANK(CRMCSSOID__pc) ), AND( $Profile.Name = "AusPost Integration", CONTAINS($User.Username, "jithandler@auspost.com.au") ) ), RecordType.Name = "Consumer", NOT(CONTAINS(FirstName, "*")), NOT(CONTAINS(LastName, "*")), OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(LegalFirstName__pc), ISCHANGED(LegalLastName__pc), ISCHANGED(Preferred_Name__pc), ISCHANGED(PersonHomePhone), ISCHANGED(PersonMobilePhone), ISCHANGED(Fax), ISCHANGED(PersonMailingStreet), ISCHANGED(MailingStreet2__pc), ISCHANGED(PersonMailingCity), ISCHANGED(PersonMailingState), ISCHANGED(PersonMailingPostalCode), ISCHANGED(PersonMailingCountry), ISCHANGED(PersonOtherStreet), ISCHANGED(PersonOtherStreet2__c), ISCHANGED(PersonOtherCity), ISCHANGED(PersonOtherState), ISCHANGED(PersonOtherPostalCode), ISCHANGED(PersonOtherCountry), ISCHANGED(Legal_Marketing_Opt_In__pc), AND( ISCHANGED(PersonEmail), PersonEmail != 'unknown@email.com' ) ) )

rules.fullName: SSSW - Default SLA for Business Customer

rules.description: Used by workflow - sets to profile of user creating record.

Rule to check if changes have been made to ANZSIC Code lookup field on the Account and if 'Industry ANZSIC Override' flag is not ticked. If Criteria is met, trigger a Flow to update the Industry, Business Category, Business Sub-Category on Account.
Update the Customer Number to Auspost Format
